response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds significant value and can greatly benefit your needs. Considering its quality and functionality, we're extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $95. This price reflects the high standards we set for our products and the exceptional service we provide to our valued customers. We're confident this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency and satisfaction. If you're interested, please let us know, and we'll proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 95}
